channel.title: Signatures and Glow BBC
channel.description:
I say take out Glow its annoying on firefox. And people use it too much. And for the Signatures I say install this mod and it gives options to what to allow in signatures bbc codes, sizes etc. People have way too big signatures and it gets annoying.
This mod will add some settings for signatures. They can be changed in Admin -> Features and Options -> Signature Settings.
Picture in use: http://mods.simplemachines.org/index.php?action-download;mod=528;id=20701;image Here is the mod url: http://mods.simplemachines.org/index.php?mod=528
